entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow or rain. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
